name: Product Review Analyzer
description: Build a tool that analyzes customer product reviews. You'll collect reviews, clean them up using string methods, count keyword occurrences, and generate a summary report. This project combines string manipulation, list comprehensions, and f-strings to process real-world text data.
learning_goals: Process text data using string methods like lower(), strip(), and split()
Use list comprehensions to filter and transform data
Format output with f-strings for readable reports

full_solution:
print("Product Review Analyzer")
print("Enter reviews (type done to finish):")
reviews = []
while True:
    review = input("Review: ")
    if review == "done":
        break
    reviews.append(review)
cleaned_reviews = [review.lower() for review in reviews]
print()
positive_keywords = ["great", "loved", "excellent"]
positive_count = 0
for review in cleaned_reviews:
    for keyword in positive_keywords:
        if keyword in review:
            positive_count += 1
            break
all_words = " ".join(cleaned_reviews).split()
long_words = [word for word in all_words if len(word) > 6]
long_words = sorted(long_words, key=len, reverse=True)
print("Analysis Results:")
print(f"Total reviews: {len(reviews)}")
print(f"Positive reviews: {positive_count}")
print(f"Longest words: {', '.join(long_words)}")
